Class EngineUseCase

java.lang.Object
engine.EngineUseCase
public class EngineUseCase extends Object
The EngineUseCase class provides a set of operations to manage engine records, utilizing the EngineRepository interface for data storage and retrieval. This class includes methods for creating, updating, deleting, filtering, and displaying engine records.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs an EngineUseCase with a specified EngineRepository.

    • EngineUseCase

      public EngineUseCase(EngineRepository engineRepository)
      Constructs an EngineUseCase with a specified EngineRepository.
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • getEngines

      public List<Engine> getEngines() throws Exception
      Retrieves all engine records from the repository.
      Returns:
      a List of all Engine objects.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during retrieval.

    • tryCreateEngine

      public void tryCreateEngine(String engineType, String enginePower) throws Exception
      Creates a new engine record and adds it to the repository.
      Parameters:
      engineType - the type of the engine.
      enginePower - the horsepower of the engine as a string.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the creation.

    • update

      public void update(Engine engine) throws Exception
      Updates an existing engine record in the repository.
      Parameters:
      engine - the Engine object containing updated information.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the update.

    • filterByHorsePower

      public List<Engine> filterByHorsePower(String horsePower) throws Exception
      Filters engine records by horsepower.
      Parameters:
      horsePower - the horsepower threshold as a string.
      Returns:
      a List of Engine objects with horsepower greater than the specified value.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during filtering.

    • displayMinMaxPowerEngines

      public List<Engine> displayMinMaxPowerEngines() throws Exception
      Displays the engines with the minimum and maximum horsepower.
      Returns:
      a List containing the Engine objects with the lowest and highest horsepower.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during retrieval.

    • displayEnginesMatchingPattern

      public List<Engine> displayEnginesMatchingPattern(String regex) throws Exception
      Displays engines that match a specified regex pattern.
      Parameters:
      regex - the regex pattern to match engine types.
      Returns:
      a List of Engine objects that match the pattern.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during retrieval.

    • save

      public void save(List<Engine> engines) throws Exception
      Saves a list of engines to the repository after sorting them by horsepower.
      Parameters:
      engines - the List of Engine objects to save.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during saving.

    • displayEnginesFromBinFile

      public List<Engine> displayEnginesFromBinFile() throws Exception
      Displays engine records from a binary file.
      Returns:
      a List of Engine objects read from the binary file.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during file reading.

    • delete

      public void delete(int id) throws Exception
      Deletes an engine record from the repository by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the engine to delete.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during deletion.
